NOTES

Statistics for all types of adjectives and adjective satellites are combined.

The total of all unique noun, verb, adjective, and adverb strings is greater than 121962. However, many strings are unique within a syntactic category, but are in more than one syntactic category. The figure in the table represents the unique strings when all syntactic categories are combined.
